mapper.select: select to_char(now(), 'YY') || to_char(now(), 'MM') || '1' || substring(#{phone}, 8) || lpad(cast(count(0)+1 as varchar), 3, '0') from tb_user where phone_tag = substring(#{phone}, 8)
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tb_user (uid, name, nick, pwd, email, phone, gender, region, birth, church, device_id, phone_tag) VALUES(#{uid}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{region}, #{birth}, #{church}, #{device_id}, substring(#{phone}, 8)) on conflict(uid) do update set name=#{name}, nick=#{nick}, pwd=#{pwd}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} , gender=#{gender}, region=#{region}, birth=#{birth}, church=#{church}, grade=#{grade} , member=#{member}, upddt=now(), device_id=#{device_id}, phone_tag =substring(#{phone},8)
